page.title: 13Economics
page.content: Prices in the Islip Village Shop (Mr Busby) in 1981 recorded by the school children as part of a project to make a record of village life in the Census year. Apples 25p lb,oranges 10p,bananas 26p lb,pears 20p lb,peaches 10p,lemons 12p. Carrots 10p lb,cabbage 10p lb,lettuce 14p,cauliflower 34p,potatoes 7p lb,onions 15p lb. Self raising flour 53p for 1.5kg,loaf of bread 39and1/2p,bread rolls 26p. Tinned foods.Baked beans 19p 439g,potatoes 24p 283g,tomato soup 30p,spam 50p 184g. Beef Topside fresh 146p lb,frozen 140p lb,mutton 82p lb,chicken 50p lb. Rice 29p 277g,Corn Flakes 62p 500g,Mars bar 14p. Tea 54p 1/4lb,coffee 1.40 100g,butter 55p 1/2lb,sugar 54p kg.(1985 prices)
